name: Evil Never Rests
description:
Somewhere out there is a creature that is hunting you endlessly.

You're only human, so you must rest occasionally or face death by sleep deprivation.

The fatigue meter lets you know your current status. Fight your fatigue by holding the rest button! There is a minimum amount of time you must rest each time to avoid a penalty.

While resting you won't be able to see anything but you can still hear your surroundings.

How long can you survive?
  • Run, sprint, and crawl your way to success.
  • The creature gets faster and faster. Don't rest for too long!
  • Areas with generators are dangerous to rest in because their sound muffles the sounds of the creature.
  • Play with mouse & keyboard or any gamepad controller you like.

* The use of headphones (preferably surround sound) is highly recommended.
